name: Ant OR Man
description:
This was seriously a blast and a big undertaking, it was my first time working with AI Enemies and was a huge learning curve. I'm really mad it broke a few hours before the jam ended but the look and functionality, aside from killing the enemies and winning or losing, that part broke an hour and a half ago -_-.   I set it to default you to level_completion after timer runs out if you still review it, I hope you can see even not functioning properly, it took a lot of hard work and determination to do it all as a solo dev. 

Thanks, Anorak
